dcterms:description: A sample of the Yelp dataset used for research on fairness-aware recommender systems, where each user has rated at least 40 businesses and each business is rated by at least 40 users. The dataset includes user ratings, explicit trust data, user demographic information, and item categories.
dcterms:title: Yelp dataset
